description:
cells_scheduler_filter:DifferentCellFilter and cells_scheduler_filter:TargetCellFilter policies are checked in nova scheduler not in nova-api.

This bug is similar to https://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/+bug/1675486.

Policies should not be checked outside nova-api.
title: cells_scheduler_filter policies checked outside nova-api

comments.content:
cells_scheduler_filter:DifferentCellFilter and cells_scheduler_filter:TargetCellFilter policies are checked in nova scheduler not in nova-api.

This bug is similar to https://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/+bug/1675486.

Policies should not be checked outside nova-api.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sujitha-neti

comments.content: not sure if someone already submit a patch?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jichenjc

comments.content: maybe we can submit a patch to check whether the target is set in api layer for scheduler_hints.target_cell so that we can pop up this scheduler hints if context is not allowed
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jichenjc

comments.content:
There are no currently open reviews on this bug, changing
the status back to the previous state and unassigning. If
there are active reviews related to this bug, please include
links in comments.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sdague

comments.content: As this is a cells v1 issue, it's in the won't fix category.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sdague
